definition: Recently; in the not too distant past. This word is commonly used to refer to events, occurrences, or situations that have taken place within a short time frame prior to the present moment.

examples.german: Kürzlich habe ich einen neuen Job gefunden.
examples.english: I recently found a new job.

examples.german: Kürzlich habe ich ein interessantes Buch gelesen.
examples.english: I recently read an interesting book.

examples.german: Kürzlich habe ich meine Familie besucht.
